channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Did social media really fuel the youth mental health crisis? ‘The Anxious Generation’ researcher calls the correlation ‘irrefutable’
item.description: 'The Anxious Generation' chief researcher holds his ground in what he calls “a normal academic debate.”

item.title: 'It's sick': Biden condemns violence after Trump injured in shooting at campaign rally
item.description: President Joe Biden, who is running for reelection against Trump, expressed gratitude that Trump is "safe and doing well."

item.title: Shooter of Trump was registered Republican and Biden donor
Trump injured but ‘fine’ after assassination attempt; FBI identifies gunman as 20-year-old Pennsylvania man
item.description: The FBI early Sunday named Thomas Matthew Crooks, 20, of Bethel Park, Pennsylvania, as the subject involved in the assassination attempt.

item.title: Photos show Trump with blood on his face after shots fired at rally
item.description: Trump was removed after loud cracking noises were heard while he was onstage at the Pennsylvania rally.

item.title: Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies rise after Trump assassination attempt
Bitcoin rises as Trump shooting seen increasing re-election odds
item.description: Bitcoin rose as much as 2.1% to $59,849.84, before paring that advance to trade at about $59,426 as of 10:25 p.m., New York time.

item.title: Nikki Haley invited to speak at Republican convention in Milwaukee
item.description: Earlier this week an aide to the former Republican presidential candidate told NBC News that she had not yet received an invitation.

item.title: Did hackers get your cell number from AT&T? Be on the lookout for these scams.
Trump assassination attempt makes election win more likely, and Americans’ willingness to use political violence may be highest since the Civil War, Ian Bremmer says
item.description: "This is the worst sort of event that can happen in that environment, and I deeply worry that this presages much more political violence and social instability to come."

item.title: Here are Trump VP hopefuls, megadonors and celebrities headlining the Republican National Convention
item.description: Donald Trump will get the official 2024 Republican presidential nod at the RNC in Milwaukee.

item.title: Postage rates are set to climb to 73 cents. Why snail-mail loyalists don’t mind.
Biden says ‘everybody must condemn’ attack on Trump as campaign halts messaging to supporters and pulls TV ads
item.description: “We cannot allow this to be happening,” Biden said. “The idea that there’s violence in America like this is just unheard of."

item.title: Bernie Sanders urges Dems to 'stop the bickering' and back Biden
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders admonished Democrats who have called for President Joe Biden to withdraw from the race against former President Donald Trump.

item.title: Meta to lift restrictions on Trump’s accounts ahead of election
